question_text:
Question 28 
 
In modern CNC machine tools, the backlash has been eliminated by
Production Engineering (CNC) 
 
(A)  ratchet and pinion 
 
 
(B)  rack and pinion 
 
(C)  preloaded ballscrews  
 
(D)  slider crank mechanism 
Ans. 
C
